snippet: Reigning champion Serena Williams ramped up the power in the second set to vanquish fifth seed Maria Sharapova for the 18th match in a row and reach the semi-finals of the Australian Open with a 6-4 6-1 victory on Tuesday....
lead_paragraph: Reigning champion Serena Williams ramped up the power in the second set to vanquish fifth seed Maria Sharapova for the 18th match in a row and reach the semi-finals of the Australian Open with a 6-4 6-1 victory on Tuesday.

headline.print_headline: Serena Maintains Hex on Sharapova to Reach Semis
headline.main: Serena Maintains Hex on Sharapova to Reach Semis
